Name: Black Nail #2
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: A Nail (Drambuie and whisk(e)y) served long with cola.
History: Created in 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England during a meeting with Drambuie's Tim Dewey, Vicki Wonders and Jamie Stephenson.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Nail #2 contains 190 calories
